entry.title: Photos Post 29: Special Events (after 1975), Part 13
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 7 Photos of the special event 1989-1211 Press Conference, New Delhi, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 4 high resolutions and 3 medium resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 7 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1989.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, February 2024

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, February 2024

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This month 28 new Photos were uploaded to 2 Pūjas as follows (1 high resolution and 27 medium resolutions).
(i) 2000-0507 Sahasrāra Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link Italy 2000.
(ii) 2005-0828 Śhrī Kṛiṣhṇa Pūjā: 27 low resolutions uploaded, link U.S.A. 2005-08.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
